body_html: I needed to add the files to CMakeLists in order for the files to be included in the Jenkins test build to pass tests. I figured that making the setup.py build work as well would be desired, in case we switch Jenkins to use it rather than cmake. But I can take that out if desired.
body_text: I needed to add the files to CMakeLists in order for the files to be included in the Jenkins test build to pass tests. I figured that making the setup.py build work as well would be desired, in case we switch Jenkins to use it rather than cmake. But I can take that out if desired.
body: I needed to add the files to CMakeLists in order for the files to be included in the Jenkins test build to pass tests. I figured that making the setup.py build work as well would be desired, in case we switch Jenkins to use it rather than cmake. But I can take that out if desired.
